entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI - Firm 1997. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D41: TÁRKI - Firm 1997. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Tóth, István János
entry.dcterms:description: type of economic organisation, ownership, employees, rentability, production, operating, exporting, transportation and invoicing discipline, taxation, debts
entry.dcterms:subject: income, property and savings
business/industrial management and organisation
social stratification and groupings
economic organization
survey data
time-series
A random sample of companies containing the 1500 biggest production companies also exporting their products; sample based on the registry of the Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH).
Data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers, and self-administered questionnaires.
B
